hero.title: Sandro Dezerio
hero.subtitle: Software Engineer | Transforming Ideas into Functional, Impactful Software
hero.description: Experienced in building end-to-end systems and guiding teams through technical challenges. I'm committed to continuous learning, clear communication, and empowering others.

description.p1: Hi, I'm Sandro Dezerio, a passionate software engineer with 8 years of experience building complete digital solutions. My journey in tech has taken me from freelance projects to leading teams in established companies, always driven by a love for problem-solving and innovation.
description.p2: I believe in the power of teamwork, clear communication, and continuous learning. Whether I'm mentoring junior developers or collaborating with cross-functional teams, I strive to create an environment where everyone can grow and succeed.
description.p3: My approach blends technical expertise with a focus on real-world impact. I enjoy transforming ideas into functional, impactful software that helps businesses automate, innovate, and thrive.
description.p4: When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring new technologies, sharing knowledge with the community, or enjoying time outdoors.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained web applications for clients across various industries.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description: Worked with small businesses to create custom software solutions.

services.title: Services
services.description: Whether you're looking to build a new product, optimize existing systems, or empower your team, I offer a range of services designed to bring your ideas to life and help your business thrive. Explore how we can work together:

servicesList.title: Backend & Full-Stack Development
servicesList.description: From database design to intuitive user interfaces, I develop complete, scalable applications that solve real business challenges and deliver seamless user experiences.

servicesList.title: API Design & Integration
servicesList.description: I craft secure, high-performance APIs and integrate disparate systems, ensuring your applications communicate efficiently and reliably-both internally and with third parties.

servicesList.title: Technical Mentorship & Code Reviews
servicesList.description: I support teams by sharing best practices, providing actionable feedback through code reviews, and fostering a culture of quality and continuous improvement.

servicesList.title: Architecture Consulting
servicesList.description: I analyze and refine your system architecture to enhance performance, scalability, and reliability-laying a solid foundation for future growth and innovation.

servicesList.title: Custom Software Solutions for Businesses
servicesList.description: No software yet? I partner with businesses to turn ideas into tailored digital solutions that automate processes, boost productivity, and drive results.

jobs.title: Fullstack Developer
jobs.company: Soul IT Solutions - IT Services and Consulting

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: I'm currently working on some exciting projects. Check back soon to see my work!

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I'm excited to connect with you! Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
